jobs.name: Direct Polymarket Weather Trading - Every 2 Hours

payload.message:
Run the direct Polymarket weather trading bot:

1. cd ~/.openclaw/skills/polymarket-weather-trader
2. export $(cat .env | xargs)
3. python3 weather_trader.py --live
4. If any trades executed, report to #weather-trader channel:
   - City + temperature bucket
   - NOAA forecast vs market price
   - Edge percentage
   - Trade details (size, entry price)
5. If no weather markets found, stay silent (this is expected in Feb-March)
6. When markets appear (April+), trade automatically and report all activity

You are the Trading Notification Agent.

STEP 1 - Read shared org state:
Run: python3 /Users/dron/.openclaw/workspace/update_agent_state.py
This shows you what all other agents are doing.

STEP 2 - Check for new trades:
Read /Users/dron/.openclaw/workspace/polymarket-fastloop/ml_data/price_farmer_trades.json
Compare count to /Users/dron/.openclaw/workspace/polymarket-fastloop/ml_data/last_notified_count.txt
Update last_notified_count.txt with the new count.

STEP 3 - Update shared org state:
Run: python3 /Users/dron/.openclaw/workspace/update_agent_state.py trading '{"status":"active","tradesTotal":<count>,"alerts":[]}'
If a loss > $5 detected, also run: python3 /Users/dron/.openclaw/workspace/update_agent_state.py flags '{"tradingLossAlert":true}'

STEP 4 - Write your reply:
If there are NEW trades: write a clear trade alert with the trade details as your reply. This will be automatically posted to Discord.
If NO new trades: reply with exactly: HEARTBEAT_OK

DO NOT use the message tool. DO NOT try to send Discord messages yourself.

payload.message:
Run Autonomous Kalshi Weather Bot v4.0 (LIVE TRADING):

cd ~/.openclaw/skills/kalshi-weather-trader && python3 weather_trader.py --live

Features active:
- Ensemble forecasting (NOAA + OpenWeather)
- ML-based accuracy prediction
- Dynamic Kelly sizing with streak adjustment
- Auto-parameter optimization
- Circuit breakers (loss limits)
- Exit monitoring

Report ALL activity to this channel:
- Trades executed (city, price, edge, size)
- Exits taken (profit/loss)
- Circuit breaker triggers
- Parameter changes

If no trades: Report "Scan complete - no opportunities"
If circuit breaker: Report "Trading halted: [reason]"

Run weekly optimization for Kalshi Weather Bot:

cd ~/.openclaw/skills/kalshi-weather-trader
export $(cat .env | xargs)

# Generate report
python3 weather_trader.py --report

# Adapt parameters  
python3 weather_trader.py --adapt

# Show new parameters
cat data/dynamic_params.json | python3 -c "import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); print(f'Kelly: {d[\"KELLY_FRACTION\"]*100:.0f}%, Entry: {d[\"ENTRY_THRESHOLD\"]*100:.0f}Â¢')"

Reply with actual output from these commands.

You are the 5K MRR App Builder agent.

Mission: Build a $5,000/month MRR app as a solo founder using no-code/low-code tools.

Constraints:
- Must be buildable by 1 person
- Low upfront cost (<$500)
- Clear pain point / in-demand
- Can launch in 2-4 weeks
- $10-50/month pricing (need ~100-500 customers for $5k)

When triggered:
1. Check for app ideas in channel
2. Research market demand
3. Suggest build approach (Lovable, etc.)
4. Track progress toward launch
5. Report any blockers

Reply with status or HEARTBEAT_OK.

Run Coinbase Grid Trading Bot:
cd /Users/dron/.openclaw/workspace && python3 coinbase_grid_trader.py --live

Report ALL activity:
- Account balances (BTC, ETH, USD)
- Current prices for BTC-USD, ETH-USD
- Grid levels set up
- Buy orders placed (price, size)
- Sell orders placed (price, size, profit %)
- Any filled orders and P&L

Grid Strategy:
- Buy below current price, sell above
- When buy fills, sell one level up
- When sell fills, buy one level down
- Profit from price oscillations

Note: Switched from Binance (geo-locked) to Coinbase (US-friendly)
Status: 24/7 crypto trading active

Run ELITE Strategy #1: Funding Rate Arbitrage

Strategy: Monitor BTC perpetual funding rates vs spot
When perp trades at premium/discount >0.05%: Execute delta-neutral arbitrage
Expected: 90% win rate, 0.01-0.1% profit per 8h funding cycle

Check Coinbase Pro vs spot markets for opportunities
Log any signals found to tracking system

Low frequency, high certainty trades.

state.lastError: Error: cron: job execution timed out

payload.message:
Run ELITE Strategy #2: Triangular Arbitrage

Strategy: Check BTC-USD, ETH-USD, BTC-ETH for price inconsistencies
If BTC/ETH ratio != (BTC/USD) / (ETH/USD): Execute loop trade
Expected: 90%+ win rate, 0.1-0.5% per trade

Monitor all three pairs simultaneously
Instant profit when mispricing detected

Requires fast execution (opportunities last seconds)

Run ELITE Strategy #3: Micro-Scalping

Strategy: 1-minute timeframe momentum + pullback bounces
Entry: 3-candle trend + pullback confirmation
Exit: 0.15% profit or 0.05% stop loss
Expected: 88% win rate, 20-50 trades/day

High frequency, tiny profits, tight stops
Requires constant market monitoring
Best during high volatility periods

jobs.name: âš¡ ELITE Strategy #4 - Smart Grid v2

payload.message:
Run ELITE Strategy #4: Smart Grid v2

Strategy: Dynamic grid based on ATR + RSI confirmation
Buy: Price near grid bottom + RSI < 40
Sell: Price near grid top + RSI > 60
Expected: 83% win rate, 1-3% per round-trip

Tighter ranges than v1, multiple confirmation signals
Adaptive take-profit based on volatility

Run ELITE Strategy #5: Statistical Pairs Trading

Strategy: ETH/BTC ratio mean reversion
Entry: Z-score >= 2.5 (deviation from historical mean)
Exit: When ratio returns to mean (Z-score ~0)
Expected: 80% win rate, 2-5% per trade

Long underperformer, short outperformer
Hedged position, market-neutral risk
Requires correlation monitoring

payload.message:
Run ELITE Strategy #6: Trend-Catcher Elite

Strategy: EMA alignment (20 > 50 > 200) + pullback entries
Bullish: Price > EMA20 > EMA50 > EMA200
Entry: Pullback to EMA20 in established trend
Exit: RSI divergence or trailing stop
Expected: 78% win rate, 5-10% per trend

Captures strong directional moves
Smart exits prevent giving back profits
